DOC.brief_summary: The PANJO study aims to evaluate, within the French public health services, the impact of a home visitors training on parent-child attachment, families outcomes, use of services and child maltreatment indicators.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the French Maternal and Child Protection Services From 11 French Territories That Have Received Common Intervention Guidelines
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous Pregnant <32 weeks of amenorrhea Answers yes to the following question: "do you feel alone facing the upcoming changes related to your child" Intends to move outside the area in which she can receive the intervention Sees a psychologist or psychiatrist at least once per week Refuses to participate
